Title: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
Overview: A highly intelligent chimpanzee named Caesar has been living a peaceful suburban life ever since he was born. But when he gets taken to a cruel primate facility, Caesar decides to revolt against those who have harmed him.
Keywords: intelligence, zoo, cage, dystopia, golden gate bridge, ape, monkey, medical research, alzheimer's disease
production_companies: Ingenious Film Partners, Ingenious Media, Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation, Dune Entertainment, Dune Entertainment III, Chernin Entertainment, Big Screen Productions
Cast: James Franco, Freida Pinto, John Lithgow
